name: Kururin Squash!
description: Kururin Squash! (くるりんスカッシュ!) is an action-puzzle video game developed by Eighting and published by Nintendo. It was released for the GameCube on October 14, 2004 exclusively in Japan. It is the successor to Kururin Paradise and is the only title of the Kururin series with 3D computer graphics.
